lead_paragraph: Experts assembled by the author David McCullough and the filmmaker Ken Burns are speaking with alarm on Facebook about the presidential candidate’s place in American history.

headline.print_headline: Scholars Steeped in Dead Politicians Take On a Live One: Trump
headline.main: Scholars Steeped in Dead Politicians Take On a Live One: Donald Trump

snippet: Experts assembled by the author David McCullough and the filmmaker Ken Burns are speaking with alarm on Facebook about the presidential candidate’s place in American history....
abstract: Jim Dwyer About New York column notes David McCullough, respected presidential historian known for neutral tone and reluctance to discuss contemporary politics, has partnered with filmmaker Ken Burns to assemble panel of historians to discuss Donald Trump's presidential candidacy; McCullough says he finds prospect of Trump presidency so alarming he cannot remain detached.
